title: PBE, RITO PLEASE
body: So my name is CalIMeWarwick,i am trying prettty long time join PBE, can you please do something and accept me :p, only if you can , i think i would be a very good and respectfull tester and teammate , i will always give fedback and keep you guys update for any bugs in the game , i am trying to join PBE so bad , its so fun and i would if you can make me a tester , if i ever get any type of report you can ban be ! i am taking this seriously , PLEASE and THANK YOU for building a community .

replies.body: I know the PBE is a popular club, but we don't have backstage passes to hand out for an expedited application.  :p  I don't have any information to share on acceptance beyond what's provided in the PBE Faq.  As long as you've applied, you will have to wait for now.  Good luck!
